name: kml-to-json-geo
description: Transform geographic data from KML files into structured JSON format with ease. kml-to-json-geo effortlessly parses placemarks, coordinates, and polygons from your KML files, converting them into a clean, accessible JSON structure. Ideal for developers working with geo-spatial data, this tool bridges the gap between complex KML documents and web-friendly JSON, simplifying the integration of geographic information into web applications and services.
author: linkruan
